title: Black Bean Hummus Recipe
description: This creamy black bean hummus is made in minutes with canned black beans, lemon, tahini, and spices; garnish with olives and serve with toasted pita.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Appetizers and Snacks Dips and Spreads Recipes Hummus Recipes Black Bean Hummus 4.7 (738) 576 Reviews 40 Photos This black bean hummus is the absolute best hummus I have ever had. It goes great with toasted pita bread. If it tastes like it needs a little extra kick, add more lemon juice. By Allrecipes Member Updated on April 8, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 40 40 40 40 Prep Time: 5 mins Total Time: 5 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 1 (15 ounce) can black beans 1 clove garlic 2 tablespoons lemon juice, or more to taste 1 ½ tablespoons tahini ½ teaspoon ground cumin, or more to taste ½ teaspoon salt, or more to taste 1⁄8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste ¼ teaspoon paprika, or as needed 10 Greek olives Directions Drain beans and reserve liquid. Place garlic into the bowl of a food processor and pulse until minced. Add black beans, 2 tablespoons bean liquid, lemon juice, tahini, cumin, salt, and cayenne pepper; process until smooth, scraping down the sides as needed. Taste and add additional bean liquid, lemon juice, tahini, cumin, salt, and cayenne pepper as needed. Transfer to a serving bowl and sprinkle with paprika. Arrange Greek olives over top. I Made It Print 862 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Black Bean Hummus 01 of 40 Photo by  Renee Pajestka 02 of 40 Photo by  DavidW 04/08/2025 A keeper! I love this recipe and make it often. Delicious with Trader Joe's spicy plantain chips. 03 of 40 Photo by  Michelle 07/14/2022 Easy to make…I love garlic so I added three cloves….I used it as a spread on my wraps. 04 of 40 Photo by  Alec Heesacker 08/20/2020 Nice Veggie Black Bean Hummus! I Love It! 05 of 40 Photo by  demsaul 06/09/2020 06 of 40 Photo by  sdrawkcab 03/29/2020 07 of 40 Photo by  Heidi Hyland Duggan 04/14/2019 the best hummus I've ever had! try drizzling truffle oil, and crumbled feta on top mmmmmm 08 of 40 Photo by  julia dreams 03/01/2019 09 of 40 Photo by  pmolloy 12/29/2018 Love this! What a great variation on traditional hummus! 10 of 40 Photo by  HANNER 03/22/2018 I love black beans and love hummus, so what's not to like? This is delicious, tasty, and healthy. I do agree that it might just taste like a black bean dip if you don't put enough lemon juice in. I feel like the tahini is an important ingredient also, so I didn't skimp there. I agree that doubling the amount of spices makes for a more flavorful dish. I love it with Trader Joe's Bite Size Everything Crackers. I'll surely be making this numerous times! 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Roasted Red Pepper Hummus 395 Ratings Hummus III 2,286 Ratings Real Hummus 1,206 Ratings Spiced Sweet Roasted Red Pepper Hummus 733 Ratings Extra Easy Hummus 672 Ratings Basic Hummus 82 Ratings Hummus IV 42 Ratings Hummus I 63 Ratings Raw Hummus 75 Ratings Jalapeño Hummus 263 Ratings Easy Beet Hummus 5 Ratings Instant Pot® Classic Hummus 4 Ratings Easy Black Bean Hummus 29 Ratings Quick Black Bean Hummus 17 Ratings Sweet Potato Hummus 35 Ratings Authentic Kicked-Up Syrian Hummus 146 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
